info.title: ArticlesAPI
info.description: The Articles API provides endpoints for managing and retrieving articles and article versions within the wiki application. It supports core CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations, search functionality, and versioning.

get.description: Get an ArticleVersion identified by it's unique ID

400.description: Bad Request, invalid Article ID format.

delete.description: Delete an Article identified by it's unique ID

400.description: Bad Request, invalid Article ID format.

head.description: Check if an Article exits given its unique ID.

get.description: Get the most recent ArticleVersion the Article with the given name from the specified Wiki.

parameters.name: wiki
parameters.description: The ID of the wiki of the Article

400.description: Bad Request, invalid Article name format.

get.description: Get a list of Articles from a given Wiki that match a keyword string. Results can by filtered by tags, sorted by different parameters and support pagination.

parameters.name: wiki_id
parameters.description: The ID of the wiki where the serch will be made

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Search query for the name of the article

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of tag IDs to search for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first result to return. Use with limit to get the next page of search results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sorts the articles by different criteria

parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.description: Single date or range

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: Filter for the author of the Article

parameters.name: editor_name
parameters.description: Filter for the editors of the Article
